a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cumulative area burnt by wildfires in 2024, World

Cumulative area burnt by
wildfires
in hectares, shown by week. Average is the mean area over the period from
2012 to 2023. Maximum and minimum are the highest and lowest years.
Data source: Global Wildfire Information System (2025)
Note: The numbers 1 to 52 on the horizontal axis represent the weeks from the start of the year, from 1 for the first week of January to 52 for
